body:
Hi guys, we need to add three additional schedules inside the Honeybee setEpzoneSchedules: work efficiency schedule, clothing insulation schedule, and air velocity schedule. We also need to insert these three schedules in people internal gain. Is it possible and how?

thank you very much Filippo

replies.body:
Filippo,

As far as I know, these schedules don't exist in the Openstudio library, although work efficiency schedule sounds very similar to occupancy activity schedule.  It sounds like you want these outputs in order to do comfort analyses and I would very much recommend doing this in GH rather than trying to get EnergyPlus to give you comfort outputs.  Use the PMV and Adaptive comfort calculator components in order to accomplish this:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FDnKc6JudCY&list=PLruLh1AdY-Sho...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FDnKc6JudCY&list=PLruLh1AdY-Sho45_D4BV1HKcIz7oVmZ8v&index=3)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dT5sqAQFZRo&list=PLruLh1AdY-Sho...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dT5sqAQFZRo&list=PLruLh1AdY-Sho45_D4BV1HKcIz7oVmZ8v&index=4)

-Chris
I assume you have already tried additionalStrings_ input to add extra schedules?
